Author: Fabienne_ayy
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Bigbom migrates to Mcashchain  Traditional advertising methods have several disadvantages. One of those is the lack of trust between partners. Advertisers are afraid their requirements won‚Äôt be met after they pay, while service providers are afraid advertisers won‚Äôt pay for completed services. Bigbom Eco provides a smart contract solution that lets both parties easily trust each other. Additionally, BigBom‚Äôs transactions are quick, cost-effective and transparent. Bigbom Eco serves as a decentralized advertising ecosystem for all parties involved in online advertising, inclusive of advertisers, service providers, content publishers, advertising channels, platforms and more. All data linked through Bigbom Eco is transparent, accurate, automated and immutable. Bigbom is part of the Bigbom Eco ecosystem.  CEO of BigBom commented: ‚ÄúMoving from Ethereum to McashChain is a strategic step for Bigbom, as it will enable scalability, instant speed, zero fee for BBO tokens to be transacted between users and when interacting with smart contracts. Moreover, MCashPay crypto payment gateway will also help advertising agencies and individual advertisers to pay in crypto with convenience the Ads Optimization Services provided by BigBom. We would like to thank our customers and token holders for their continued support, and we look forward to working closely with MCashChain Team in the coming months.‚Äù   Full announcement: https://medium.com/mcashchain/bigbom-migrates-to-mcashchain-99426b7c6a05

Author: lana_m
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Midas & Vinex partner with Blockcard  Midas Protocol - a powerful and secure universal crypto wallet that enables STORE, SWAP, STAKE, SHARE & SPEND multiple coins & tokens, Portfolio chart, Transactions history, Price & balance change notification, view Binance & Vinex.Network exchange portfolio via API key.  Vinex is a dynamic and fast-growing exchange that offers High-performance trading, Extensive APIs, 24/7 support, Staking reward, Airdrop center, OTC support, Leaderboard as Social Trading Functionality.  MCashChain is a Decentralized and Social e-Payment Platform with Zero Fee and Lighting Speed, which aims to Enable Frictionless Digital Economy. MCashChain is secured, transparent, highly scalable and made for DApps development in both Midas ecosystem and others‚Äô. The application of MCashChain is unlimited with the high-speed transaction, zero fees for ordinary users and high scalability in nature.  Ternio's mission is to accelerate the use of blockchain and cryptocurrency into everyday life. Ternio provides white-label technology to enterprise customers giving blockchain and cryptocurrency real-world application. Ternio‚Äôs blockchain framework (Lexicon) demonstrates how blockchain can make business better, faster, more efficient. Ternio‚Äôs crypto debit card (BlockCard) gives cryptocurrency real-world spending power. Ternio has solved the issues related to blockchain scalability and payment utility of cryptocurrency.  Ternio‚Äôs BlockCard‚Ñ¢ is a physical debit card powered by Ternio. With BlockCard‚Ñ¢, cardholders are empowered to use over 12 different cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and others to purchase whatever they want, wherever world major credit cards are accepted. BlockCard is the fastest, cheapest, and most convenient way for consumers to use their cryptocurrency when and how they want.  Midas, Vinex and Blockcard will enter into a partnership whereby:  Vinex Network users will access to a BlockCard pending KYC requirements Midas community members will enjoy better discounts through a joint marketing program All tokens/coins supported by Blockcard will be listed on Vinex Network exchange Mutual support and collaboration in the U.S, Europe, ASEAN markets (especially Singapore & Vietnam) in term of business and regulation. Dr. Alex Nguyen, Midas CSO commented: We are happy to collaborate with Blockcard to contribute to greater adoption of cryptocurrencies and to access to new markets through the partnership. Mr. Daniel Gouldman, Ternio Co-founder added: We‚Äôre very excited to be working with Midas and Vinex because they‚Äôre perfectly complementary to BlockCard as a cryptocurrency debit card. This partnership allows us to extend the reach of our blockchain technology into ASEAN markets while helping to facilitate further adoption of the TERN token. Bird‚Äôs eye-view of Midas ecosystem: https://blog.midasprotocol.io/birds-eye-view-of-midas-ecosystem/  Midas Wallet Blogs: https://blog.midasprotocol.io Telegram: https://t.me/midasprotocolglobal , https://t.me/MidasPR Facebook: https://fb.com/MidasProtocol.io Twitter: https://twitter.com/MidasProtocol Website: https://www.midasprotocol.io Get it for free & experience Convenience at its best: http://onelink.to/xyqb5u  MCashChain Website: https://www.MCash.Network Twitter: https://Twitter.com/MCashChain Telegram: https://t.me/MCashChain ; https://t.me/MCashChainPR Blog: https://medium.com/MCashChain Facebook: https://facebook.com/MCashChain

Author: Holmanlee
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: The reason I bought MAS is pretty straightforward. At first sight, I saw the announcement about partnership between TOMO and Midas. And, I decided to scrutinize abt this project by spending my entire afternoon to read 40 pages of the WP. I found it interesting and decided to invest just a little amount of ETH in the Pioneer sale. But, time by time, new announcement about the ecosystem, statistic and vision of Midas from the cofounders continuously released. I then decided to take a gamble and put the rest bag of my eth to this project. Up to now, what team has done is terrific. The wallet is super smooth and UX/UI is clean, now I can store, swap among ERC-20 tokens and also keep my btc safely in my phone. The upcoming pool in Midas foundation will be a masternode for tomo and zcoin which will generate the passive income for Pioneers (this shit is dope) =)). So, I do not freaking care about other discussing about Midas. To me, Midas is the best ICO, I have ever invested.

Body: Our beloved Midasians, come and join us for a chance to win prizes in total worth of 480,000 MAS and 5,000 KNC .  Event period: 23/11/2018 00:00:00 - 08/12/2018 00:00:00 (GMT+8) How to participate: Sign-in to swap/trade any tokens on the Midas Protocol wallet during the specified period. Yep, it‚Äôs that easy. Requirements: Download The Midas Protocol Wallet to your smartphone (either Android or iOS) and just have fun!  1. Just Swap & Get Rewarded! Because winning has never been so easy  Total Reward: 300,000 MAS To Win: Simply sign-in & make at least 1 swap in the event period on the Midas Protocol wallet. This automatically qualifies you into the reward pool of which the total prize of 300,000 MAS will be split equally. Winners will be announced on the Midas Reddit community at the end of the event.  2. Trading Challenge Not a rookie anymore? Wanna prove it? Trade & qualify into our TOP 3 to cash on the pool prize of 45,000 MAS!  TOP 3‚Äôs Prizes  T1st: 20,000 MAS T2nd: 15,000 MAS T3rd: 10,000 MAS  Round 1 (23/11/2018 - 30/11/2018):              A. TOP 3 with the largest accumulated trading amount              B. TOP 3 with the highest number of trades Round 2 (01/12/2018 - 08/12/2018):              A. TOP 3 with the largest accumulated trading amount              B. TOP 3 with the highest number of trades Winners of each round will be announced on the Midas Reddit community on the 1st & 9th of December.  3. Grand Lucky Draw  Round 1 (23/11/18 - 30/11/18): 6 lucky traders will be picked at random & each receive 416 KNC tokens. Round 2 (01/12/18 - 08/11/18): 6 lucky traders will be picked at random & each receive 416 KNC tokens. How to participate: Simply sign-in and swap/trade on the Midas Protocol wallet Winners will be announced on the Midas Reddit community on the 1st & 9th of December.   Terms and Conditions Midas Protocol and Kyber Network reserve the right to cancel or amend the Events or the Event Rules at their sole discretion without prior notice. Reward tokens will be distributed within 2 weeks after the event ends. Each winner is only eligible for 1 prize - whichever larger. You can subscribe and check the prizes at stake every week via Midas Reddit community. Author: snguyen
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: It‚Äôs time for us to grow our users base and increase $MAS adoption. Again we would like to take this opportunity to give back to Midas community. If you love $MAS, pass $MAS on! Invite your friends to download our Midas wallet app and:  1. own minimum 500 $MAS OR 2. be able to invite others  Then, if you are:  Pioneer Master: with your first 50 accepted friends who meet 2 conditions above, you will receive the reward of 800 $MAS/friend. For next 50 friends, you will get 400 $MAS/friend, then for next 50 friends, you will get 200 $MAS/friend. Pioneer Jedi: similarly, the rewards will be 600 - 400 - 200 ($MAS) Pioneer Guardian: similarly, the rewards will be 400 - 200 - 100 ($MAS) Pioneer Warrior: similarly, the rewards will be 200 - 100 - 50 ($MAS) Pioneer Apprentice: similarly, the rewards will be 100 - 50 - 25 ($MAS) Midasian: similarly, the rewards will be 50 - 25 - 12.5 ($MAS) From friend 151, the reward will be 12.5 $MAS for all.  For friends who meet only one condition (own MAS or invite others), will still get you reward of 12.5 $MAS.  If your friend continue to invite their friends, they will be treated the same as other Midasians.  The below graph demonstrates on how the campaign works:     AND SPECIAL REWARD TO TOP INVITERS    Total reward pool for top 100: 470,000 $MAS  Total rewards for each qualified participant will be recorded and updated real-time on their Midas Wallet Profile (available from Beta 1.1.5+) and Midas Cabinet Account (when you sign in https://www.midasprotocol.io)  This campaign will run for 33 days starting from 29 November 2018. Final total rewards will be declared when the event completes (00:00, 01 January 2019 - Yay, Happy new year!). After the campaign ends, your rewards will be automatically transferred to your Vinex Network account within 2 weeks for you to trade or to withdraw to your wallet.  Total reward pool for this campaign is 5,000,000 MAS. Rewards will be allocated proportionately if the absolute win amount exceeds 5,000,000.  We hope that this referral campaign will benefit many of our loyal Pioneers, and reward for your effort of improving your ranks during the bonus distribution period. Our Way Of Saying‚Ä¶ Thank You! Share and Earn More with Midas Ecosystem! Pass It On! Author: Fabienne_ayy
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Midas Ecosystem - One Stop Solution  After one year of development, we are ready to roll out all services that Midas Ecosystem can offer to the market.  1. Coin Listing on Vinex.Network exchange 2. Coin Listing on UniDex Exchange 3. Coin Listing as default on Midas Protocol Wallet 4. dApp Listing as default on Midas dApp browser (MCashChain, Ethereum, Tomochain, Tron) 5. Coin integration with MCashPay Crypto Payment Gateway 6. Trading Contest on Vinex.Network exchange 7. Dapp on Demand 8. Unidex‚Äôs multi-chain bridge to swap mirrored tokens (eg. between ERC20/TRC20 and M1/M20) 9. Shop opening on Midashimaya C-Commerce Platform 10. Airdrop campaign on Vinex and Midas wallet  Especially if payments are made in $MAS or $MCash, there will be a 20% discount* on all services. So now, MAS/MCash utility is not only for individual clients but also for corporate clients and project teams.  To get the Latest Quote on our services, please contact us at info@midasprotocol.io  Find out more: https://blog.midasprotocol.io/midas-ecosystem-one-stop-solution-services/

Author: Fabienne_ayy
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: MEET MIDAS PROTOCOL CHIEF EVANGELIST  If there is one thing startups are known for, it‚Äôs passion. To build a company is to go against all the odds, and the only way to do that is by maintaining our goal fiercely. That is why every company needs an Evangelist. We are happy to introduce Aaron Ting, new Midas Protocol‚Äôs Chief Evangelist. Aaron is the Secretary of Access Blockchain Association Malaysia and VP of Malaysian Investors‚Äô Association. He is a well-known crypto community and blockchain industry builder in Malaysia working closely with government, regulators, and industry on critical initiatives. He is also the local partner of Blockon, a significant crypto industry events company in Asia which held 40 events from 2017, as an organizer, co-organiser and lead sponsor. His background ‚Äî consulting, sales, marketing operations leadership positions, along with his dedication to bringing easy-to-use and accessible tools for well-being to the masses. He is experienced in developing markets and sourcing for oilfield products and services in key markets in the Middle East, Asia, and Australasia. Besides, Aaron is a Blockchain Pioneer and Advocate in Malaysia since 2013 focused on bringing NGOs, government, industry players, and the community at large at the country/regional/global level together. Moreover, he is an expert in developing campaigns, strategies, and solutions that have generated multiple folds and millions in revenue growth; exceptional trainer and mentor with skills to motivate individual peak performance from team members while driving sustained forward growth momentum. Beyond believing in the success of the company, the role of the evangelist is to preach their benefit and convince all ‚Äúnon-believers‚Äù of the value of the company. Aaron‚Äôs job in this position is to tell the world Midas Ecosystem‚Äôs story and the exciting new things ahead. The industry is amid both disruption and progression ‚Äî new technologies, sharpened competition, and a renewed focus on guest experience ‚Äî producing some exciting and thought-provoking discourse. With a new Chief Evangelist role added to its roster, Midas Protocol is excited to start interacting with the market in new ways.  Aaron‚Äôs LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/aaron-t-8633881/

Author: Fabienne_ayy
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: MoneyPool development on MCashChain  Singapore, 14th July 2019, MCashChain is a Decentralized and Social e-Payment Platform with Zero Fee and Lighting Speed, which aims to Enable Frictionless Digital Economy. MCashChain will have the most aspired characters for high throughput dApps required by Midas Ecosystem and our dApps extension allies. By learning from all existing dPos Chains, MCashChain eliminates the pain points, and the instability of previous chains developed. 10k TPS with LightningSend feature enabled since the 1st day, 3-second block confirmation time, zero-fee for ordinary users, fully integrated with a larger Midas ecosystem, including Midas Wallet, Vinex.Network exchange and cross-chain exchange UniDex.  MoneyPool is a blockchain game platform offering a skilled based game for mobile devices. In MoneyPool, multiple players can compete against each other, playing billiards on a bet. The game offers in-game purchase items for MNPL and MNPLM tokens. Players can also participate in tournaments. All MNPL or MNPLM tokens won in MONEYPOOL can be withdrawn to an external wallet, such as Midas Wallet, and exchange on various crypto exchanges. MoneyPool is among the first mobile blockchain game selected to be on MCashChain and benefits from MCashChain‚Äôs secure, transparent, highly scalable solution, specially catered tools for dApps.  Mr. Phillip Phung, Chief Marketing Officer of MCashChain commented: ‚ÄúWe welcome MoneyPool to join our Midas ecosystem as one of the first few platforms selected to be on MCashChain. The synergy is strong, and we are confident that MCashChain would bring great value and growth to MoneyPool with our decentralized & social e-payment solution with Lighting speed & Zero fee. We also look forward to working with MoneyPool to expand both operations to new territories and to serve millions of users soon.‚Äù Ivan Vakar CEO MONEYPOOL: We are happy to partner with MCashChain. It is a big step forward for the MONEYPOOL. I‚Äôm sure the synergy between MCashChain and MONEYPOOL will bring benefits and convenience for users worldwide.  MCashChain Ecosystem:  Website: https://www.MCash.Network Twitter: https://Twitter.com/MCashChain Telegram: https://t.me/MCashChain ; https://t.me/MCashChainPR Blog: https://medium.com/MCashChain Bitcointalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5151766 Bird‚Äôs eye-view of Midas ecosystem: https://blog.midasprotocol.io/birds-eye-view-of-midas-ecosystem/  MONEYPOOL community:  Website: https://moneypool.fun Twitter: https://twitter.com/pool_money Telegram: https://t.me/moneypoolcryptogames; https://t.me/moneypoolofficial Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/moneypool.fun/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/moneypoolgame/

Author: Fabienne_ayy
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: GemMob development on MCashChain  Singapore, 18th July 2019, Gemmob Game Studio is an indie mobile game developer whose mission is to build world-class games for everyone whoever they are, wherever they stay, whatever they do and whenever they want. Gemmob believes that mobile games are a good source of entertainment for everyone and the studio is built on creating world-class games for all to play everywhere at any time, bringing them the best leisure time in their daily life.  MCashChain is a Decentralized and Social e-Payment Platform with Zero Fee and Lighting Speed, which aims to Enable Frictionless Digital Economy. MCashChain will have the most aspired characters for high throughput dApps required by Midas Ecosystem and our dApps extension allies. By learning from all existing dPos Chains, MCashChain eliminates the pain points, and the instability of previous chains developed. 10k TPS with LightningSend feature enabled since the 1st day, 3-second block confirmation time, zero-fee for ordinary users, fully integrated with a larger Midas ecosystem, including Midas Wallet, Vinex.Network exchange and cross-chain exchange UniDex.  GemMob and Midas Protocol has entered into a partnership as follows:  - GemMob Token to be issued on MCashChain (GMT)  - GemMob Token to be listed on Vinex Network and UniDex  - GemMob Token to be fully integrated on MCashPay  Over a hundred dApps will be developed on MCashChain and run directly from Midas dApp Store browser. Original titles games apps will also be developed and use MCashLight, MCashPay to fuel the game plays.  Mr. Ngoc Nguyen, Co-founder & Chief Technology Architect of MCashChain, commented: ‚ÄúThis partnership is the showcase of the use of blockchain and cryptocurrencies to drive e-sport on Blockchain. Deep integration of GemMob and Midas Ecosystem will bring more joy and fun to the game lovers around the world."  Mr. Hung Le Dinh, Co-founder & CEO at GemMob Game Studio added: ‚ÄúThe collaboration between Gemmob and Midas is our next step to develop world-class mobile games. The use of blockchain and cryptocurrencies in mobile games would enhance in-game experience and offer external value to our players as a reward for their playing time.‚Äù  GemMob Ecosystem:  Website: https://gemmob.com/ Blog: https://medium.com/@gemmob.ltd Midas Wallet and MCashChain ecosystem: Website: https://www.MCash.Network Twitter: https://Twitter.com/MCashChain Telegram Global: https://t.me/MCashChain Announcement Channel: https://t.me/MCashChainPR Blog: https://medium.com/MCashChain

Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Midas Wallet & MCashChain partner with CoolBitX  Midas Protocol and MCashChain today announced a partnership with CoolBitX to integrate the blockchain security company‚Äôs celebrated mobile hardware wallet, CoolWallet S, with the Midas wallet app. They will also release a co-branded version of the CoolWallet S that will have native support for MCashChain and be available to Midas customers for purchase on the Midashimaya blockchain e-commerce platform using multiple cryptocurrencies such as the TrueVND stable coin.  Full announcement: https://medium.com/mcashchain/midas-wallet-mcashchain-partner-with-coolbitx-a1a492a9bddd

Author: midasprotocol
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Midas Protocol Listing Announcement  Midas Protocol is an intelligent platform created for crypto-traders, from newbies to experts. We aim to be the smartest universal wallet for all essential crypto needs, from safekeeping, intelligent trading, portfolio management, easy conversion to fiat and spending of cryptocurrencies. Running the roadmap and focusing on product development are at the heart of our growth strategy.  Following our product Alpha-1 release on 20 September, we‚Äôre excited to announce that Midas Protocol token (MAS) will be listed on both top Decentralized Exchanges and Centralized Exchanges, as planned. The reason we select those exchanges is not only because of the ‚Äúbrand-value‚Äù factor but also on the security level that those exchanges uphold.  Decentralized Exchanges: IDEX (25/09/2018) Kyber Network (27/09/2018)  Centralized Exchanges: BiBox (Voting from 28/09 - 05/10/2018, listed during the week after if voting round won) Vinex Network (30/09/2018)  We would like to call for support from the community to vote for Midas Protocol on Bibox. Every Bix token voted towards Midas Listing will be rewarded with 15 MAS.  Visit our social channels for latest update and discussion on Midas Ecosystem: Reddit: reddit.com/r/MidasProtocolOfficial Bitcointalk: bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3718145.0 Blogs: blog.midasprotocol.io Telegram group: t.me/midasprotocolglobal Website: MidasProtocol.io  Full announcement: https://blog.midasprotocol.io/midas-protocol-listing-announcement/

Author: salforis
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Let me answer your questions please! ( Snguyen is our CTO and he is very busy now) Vinex now is on alpha stage. Vinex beta will be ready in 30/9 with Btc, Eth, Knc, Tomo, Mas, Zcoin, Bch, TrueUSD (and USDT soon). MAS is base coin in Vinex and will be used on this exchange for commission. About mobile app, Midas Wallet Android Alpha-1 was released on the 20th of September 2018 with the following functionalities: 1. Wallet Management with hardware-backed Keystore for highest security-level 2. Completed features ETH and ERC-20 tokens 3. Essential Portfolio-management 4. Instant swap ETH & ERC-20 tokens with Kyber.network Please read here for details In the future, our Midas wallet will connect with both CEX and DEX with many other features ( trading tools, news, AI ...).

Author: salforis
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: We have plan for listing. They still have other exchanges that are not small so liquidity still can be provided. We need to build momentum and care for all, not only the dumpers. From the beginning the focus was never the hype, it was always on the product and roadmap that we uphold. We cannot because of some irrational people and make the decision that harm our healthy roadmap to the future. Going after the big exchange first is the big mistake. Many projects go to big then being delisted, many going to the big and spend all the money raised and nothing left for product development - which should be the heart of all things. Anyway, Bibox is top 10 exchanges. We value bibox also because of security and other things. We think Bibox is truly fit.  Are we confident that we can actually win the Bibox thing? When it comes to voting, if we say Yes then also not "politically" correct, if we say No then it's stupidest answer wen can provide. Hence, we will choose not to say Yes, not to say No but we do our best to win.

Pay for good exchanges with our money which you raised! This is absolutely impudence! You raised 8+ mln usd, waiting 4 month and dont pay any single cent for lisiting! WTF?

Author: midasprotocol
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: MIDAS PROTOCOL PUBLIC ICO IS STARTING ON 1st JULY 2018  Dear Pioneers, Midasians and Friends of Midas,  First and foremost, allow us from Midas Protocol team to Thank You - our dear community for your contribution and support thus far. We are glad to announce that our Pioneer Sales has closed at 98% of hardcap. We are now rolling in Public ICO with much confidence and excitement. And we hope to have you all joining us again on this amazing ride.  Midas Protocol Public ICO will start on 1st July 2018, at 00:00 (GMT+8) - MidasProtocol.io  Total number of MAS tokens available for sale during Public ICO: 5,000,000 MAS (equivalent to 500 ETH or 500,000 TOMO).  Our ICO will last till 15th July 2018 or all MAS tokens sold out, whichever earlier.  To participate Midas Protocol public ICO, you must sign up for a Midas Protocol account, pass our KYC process and get Whitelisted status. Join our telegram group for more details on Midas Protocol ICO and get direct support from our friendly Community Managers (those with ‚Äúadmin‚Äù tag): t.me/midasprotocolglobal Tokens accepted during ICO: ETH and TOMO Minimum purchase amount is 0.1 ETH or 100 TOMO. No maximum limit. There will be a Contract Address for ETH contribution; and a Wallet Address for TOMO contribution. These 2 addresses will be displayed on your cabinet at our website MidasProtocol.io. Please send your ETH/TOMO contribution to those corresponding addresses. Only send your ETH/TOMO contribution from MEW or other wallets supporting ERC-20 tokens that you keep private key. DON‚ÄôT SEND ETH FROM EXCHANGES DIRECTLY OR YOU WON‚ÄôT BE ABLE TO RECEIVE OUR MAS TOKENS. All official emails are sent only from addresses with @midasprotocol.io at the end. Our ONLY OFFICIAL website is MidasProtocol.io We NEVER solicit investments on Telegram or any other social channels. Only trust messages from member with an ‚Äúadmin‚Äù tag on our Telegram group. MIDAS PROTOCOL MANAGEMENT/STAFF/ADMINS NEVER DIRECTLY MESSAGE YOU FIRST. WE NEVER ASK YOU TO TRANSFER/SEND ANY AMOUNT IN ANY CURRENCY. WE NEVER ASK FOR PRIVATE KEY OF YOUR WALLET. BEWARE OF SCAMMERS! For more information, please visit our official blog at blog.midasprotocol.io and website MidasProtocol.io

Author: midasprotocol
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: MIDAS PROTOCOL ICO SOLD OUT  Within 19 hours opening, 5 millions MAS tokens have been sold out, mainly to TOMO holders & contributors. In summary, we have collected 1.234 ETH and 498,766.54 TOMO during our public ICO. 5,000,000 MAS has been distributed through smart contract from wallet:  0xb28b47e0545fa9ee79a01a705c43372ad1c1bd5d  From today till 7th July 2018 we will:  1. Distribute MAS to Pioneers 245,000,000 MAS tokens to be distributed to Pioneers and Contributors are currently kept at this wallet:  0xf51fae722c900a62050e48f519dba559092272b2  2. Announce and distribute bounty rewards  Being self-regulated according to the Global ICO Transparency Alliance Framework and Standards, we would like to make public the wallet holding our Team‚Äôs MAS token and locked period accordingly for public perusal.  Team tokens: 125,000,000 MAS of Midas Core is kept at the following wallet address:  0x7c2ec80fad52b5830c94d1b8a584758f256a06b7  This wallet also hold the contribution in ETH and TOMO from Pioneers and Midasians.  Vesting schedule:  06 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 12 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 18 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 24 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 30 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 36 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 42 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 48 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 54 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed, 60 month: 12,500,000 MAS to be distributed.  To add MAS token to your wallet, you can use the Token Contract Address as follows:  0x23ccc43365d9dd3882eab88f43d515208f832430 (Token Symbol: "MAS", Decimals: "18")  Our team takes pride in dedication to building value with a blend of intellectual and strong sense of commitment. We have started focusing our resources and efforts to build product, and eventually create long-term value at Midas ecosystem.  Again, we‚Äôd like to Thank You - our Partners, Team members, Pioneers, Supporters, Advocates for your continuing support, your confidence and above all for your Trust.  To 1168 Pioneers, please continue to vote and contribute ideas on Midas Foundation. More benefits will come soon to serve you.  In Code we trust, in You we believe!  Stay tuned for our latest development at: t.me/midasprotocolglobal  For complete information, please visit: MidasProtocol.io | blog.midasprotocol.io

Author: salforis
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Hi all! I am Midas Protocol's community manager and have been involving in project since the beginning. Firstly i want to thank you for supporting our project. I would be happy to answer any questions you may have on Midas Protocol and Midas Ecosystem.  For those who do not yet understand our project, please let me introduce a bit: Midas Protocol aims to be the smartest universal wallet for all essential crypto needs from safekeeping, intelligent trading, portfolio management, easy conversion to fiat and spending of cryptocurrencies. And we also expand our ecosystem with 3 pillars: 1/ Midas Protocol 3-in-1 Wallet: A multi-crypto-currencies wallet that users can use to store multi-cryptocurrencies and tokens; and conduct complex trading activities directly from wallet with multiple DEXs and CEXs, using multiple advanced order-types including automated execution settings; spend crypto-currencies on any consumer-brand outlets and any e-commerce platform that integrate with Midas wallet.  2/ Midas Foundation: A Decentralised Autonomous Organization (DAO) that aims to kickstart potential frontier technology projects, provide reliable information and validate projects according to Global Transparency Alliance Framework. The foundation is dedicated to bring the most of benefits and rewards to Midas Pioneers & Midasians as well as to grow and protect their investments in Midas Ecosystem. The ultimate objective of Midas Foundation is to innovate in such a way that it can provide passive income and smart investment opportunities to the Pioneers through rewards/airdrops from those projects that are supported by the Foundation.  3/ Vinex Network Crypto Exchange: A centralized exchange using Midas Token (MAS) as base coin for its trading fees. Besides trading pairs with BTC and ETH, it also has trading pair with MAS. This exchange provides not only crypto - crypto trading functionality but also crypto - fiat capability which can be enabled depending on jurisdiction. MAS token collected at Vinex Network will be burned periodically. Vinex will also be a security test & research ground for all functionalities of Midas wallet, especially different type of buy - sell customized orders and AI assisted portfolio balancing.  Hard cap sold out so far and we have completed the distribution of MAS Tokens. MAS Tokens will be listed latest in September and now they are locked. We partnered with Tomochain, Zcoin, Kambria, Cynopsis / Traceto.io, Suchapp, Bigbom.

Author: nguyenanhkhoi1
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: I want to ask abt the security of the wallet. Is it safe to store all the coins?

Author: salforis
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: I‚Äôm glad you asked!     The private key(s) only stay in your wallet mobile/desktop app, and in encrypted form. It only can be decrypted by your password (to open wallet app). The wallet app will be auto-lock if you're inactive in few minutes (configurable time).     If users are more paranoid, they can use settings to require both Password/PIN and OTP to unlock wallet.     On Midas web dashboard, we use 2-factor authentication (OTP) and consider accepting login by Civic or uPort as a way to fully blockchain-ize our platform. Besides that, we're researching other interesting ways to integrate Civic/uPort with wallet app to increase security and improve UX at the same time. I really like the idea about social circle of uPort. Another thing we're considering is using U2F, USB-dongle, FIDO,... to improve security for Midas desktop wallet app and Midas web dashboard.

Author: snguyen
Title: [ANN] Midas Protocol - Portfolio and Asset Management Platform for Everyone
Body: Social channels:Telegram | Reddit | Facebook | Twitter | Medium    Midas ecosystem has 3 key pillars: Midas Protocol, Midas Foundation and Vinex Network Crypto Exchange.   Pillar 1: Midas Protocol Wallet   INTELLIGENT PLATFORM TO MANAGE, INVEST, TRADE AND SPEND CRYPTOASSETS.  ANYTIME - ANYWHERE - SECURED!   Website: MidasProtocol.io  Midas Protocol is a multi-crypto-currencies wallet that users can use to store multi-cryptocurrencies and tokens; and conduct complex trading activities directly from wallet with multiple DEXs and CEXs, using multiple advanced order-types including automated execution settings; spend crypto-currencies on any consumer-brand outlets and any e-commerce platform that integrate with Midas wallet.   Run on all major platforms: Windows, Unix, iOS, Android, Web Safely store various type of cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, ERC-20 tokens, Dash, EOS, NEO, NEP-5 tokens, Waves, Decred, Lisk, Zcoin, PIVX, etc...) Safely send coins and tokens to friends and contacts Safely connect and spend cryptocurrencies on any E-commerce platform that accept crypto payment directly or via a crypto payment service provider Safely and directly trade with decentralized exchanges without sending private key to any external party Safely and directly trade with centralized exchanges without sending API key to any third party Monitor and manage their portfolio: how it changes over time, and historical transactions/trades in details Get notified when important crypto news release or when a cryptocurrency in your portfolio change substantially or your trades get executed Get rewards with high-performance ROI portfolio Subscribe, follow, copy trade strategies from top investors/traders   TOKEN SALES:  Token Symbol: MAS Total MAS token: 500,000,000 Totak MAS token for sale: 250,000,000 Pioneer sale:25/05 - 10/06 (bonus 35%) Public sale:01 -15/07/2018 Hardcap: 18,000 ETH Softcap: 5,000 ETH 1 ETH = 10,000 MAS  Public Sale is Now Closed! Hard cap reached!   Pillar 2: Midas Foundation   Midas Foundation is a Decentralised Autonomous Organization that runs on a web-based platform. It aims to kickstart potential frontier technology projects, provide reliable information and validate projects according to Global Transparency Alliance Framework. Midas Foundation is dedicated to bring the most of benefits and rewards to Midas Pioneers & Midasians as well as to grow and protect their investments in Midas Ecosystem.  Website: Midas.Foundation  Some highlight functions to take note:   Midas Pioneers can submit projects for Midas Board and Midas Community‚Äôs perusal. There will be 3 rounds of vote: Expert voting (internal), Pioneers voting (public) and Midasians voting (public). Pioneers will be ranked into 5 levels of Midas Power based on their MAS holding position, giving them different power in voting. Midasians will vote based on MAS stakes. When voting, both Pioneers and Midasians will be rewarded with MAS token for their voting effort as token of appreciation. Projects passed 3 rounds of vote will have to give rewards to the participants as airdrops (using Vinex Airdrop Center) and offer higher bonuses during their ICO sales (if any). Pooling function to invest in ICOs and Masternodes supported by Midas Foundation, to get maximum bonus.  Completed pools: Kambria ICO, Divi Project Masternode, Extradecoin ICO   ROADMAP  Q1/2018: Project initiation Idea completion Platform design Technology & Market research finalization  Q2/2018: TokenSale 06/2018: Pioneer 07/2018: ICO   Q3/2018: Alpha launch MidasProtocol¬Æ Wallet alpha release (support BTC, ETH, ERC20 tokens) Basic Portfolio management Kyber.network integration MidasProtocol¬Æ testnet Atomic cross-chain transfers (testnet)   Q4/2018: Beta launch MidasProtocol¬Æ Advanced wallet (supports Nav, Monero, Nano, Zerocoin protocol) Advanced Portfolio Management Multi-exchanges integration MidasFoundation¬Æ voting starts (testnet) Reward engine implementation (testnet)   Q1/2019: Launch MidasFoundation¬Æ MidasFoundation¬Æ release Reward engine release APIs for 3rd party bots and apps ICO report & alert   Q2/2019: Tool for market analysis & prediction Atomic cross-chain trading release Support advanced trading Machine Learning & AI for advanced technical analysis   Late 2019 & Early 2020 Grow community MidasProtocol¬Æ and MidasFoundation¬Æ Open APIs    Pillar 3: Vinex Network Crypto Exchange   Vinex Network Crypto Exchange is a centralized exchange using Midas Token (MAS) as base coin for its trading fees. Besides trading pairs with BTC and ETH, it also has trading pair with MAS. This exchange provides not only crypto - crypto trading functionality but also crypto - fiat capability which can be enabled depending on jurisdiction. MAS token collected at Vinex Network will be burned periodically. Vinex will also be a security test & research ground for all functionalities of Midas wallet, especially different type of buy - sell customized orders and AI assisted portfolio balancing.  Website: Vinex.Network  In early version, Vinex will have:  High Performance: capability to process 500,000 orders per second Multiple coin and token support: BTC, ETH, MAS, EOS, BCH, LTC, DASH, XZC, KNC, TOMO Multilingual Support: English and Mandarin All Devices Covered: Web and Android first, others arriving soon after Extensive APIs: Support 3rd-party trading platforms and algorithmic trading bot Referral Program: 5 levels of commission Multiple user power level: Based on trading size and frequency. Higher level receives higher bounty and airdrop New token listing will be selected and voted by Midas Pioneers and Midasians.    Big Milestones  The Alpha Version of Midas Foundation was released on the 15th of June 2018. The Alpha Version of Vinex Network was released on the 8th of August 2018, followed by bi-weekly upgrade. Midas Wallet Android Alpha-1 was released on the 20th of September 2018. Midas Wallet IOS Alpha-1 was released on the 23th of September 2018. DiviProject Masternode held by Midas Foundation on the 26th of September 2018. Vinex Network Beta is opened to public on the 30th of September 2018. Midas Wallet Android Alpha-2 was released on the 8th of October 2018. Midas Wallet IOS Alpha-2 was released on the 5thof October  2018.   Exchanges  IDEX Kyber.Network Bibox   Team     Partners and Investors
